title.narrative: DPSP III: Financial Instruments for Brazil Energy Efficient Cities - FinBRAZEEC

description.narrative: The development objective of the project is to unlock private financing for urban energy efficiency projects in Brazil by reducing the credit risk and enhancing the technical quality of Efficient Street Lighting and Industrial Energy Efficiency projects through: (i) the establishement of a financing facility for efficient street lighting and industrial energy efficiency; and (ii) technical assistance to enhance Caixa Economica Federal (CEF)’s capacity to implement the project. The financing facility will comprise of (a) a loan syndication amoung CEF and commercial banks/investors and (b) a guarantee fund managed by CEF.
